title: The empress of Morocco a farce : acted by His Majesties servants.
author: Duffett, Thomas.
notes: The Empress of Morocco is a burlesque of Settle's play of the same name, and the epilogue a travesty of the witches' scene in Macbeth.
Attributed to Thomas Duffet. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
"Epilogue: being a new fancy after the old, and most surprising way of Macbeth" (p. [27]-39) has special t.p.
Imperfect: film lacks port. of Griffin, the actor.
